COMMIT.MESSAGE: stats: get mem limit from the cgroup b25b330306782019d7aaf7618cd4598a9ae87250 introduced this behaviour. It was fine at the time because we didn't support "container update", so the limit could not be changed at runtime. Since it is not possible to change the memory limit at runtime, read the limit as reported from the cgroup. https://github.com/containers/crun/pull/1217 is required for crun. Closes: https://github.com/containers/podman/issues/18621 Signed-off-by: Giuseppe Scrivano <gscrivan@redhat.com>
